    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Hühnerfamilie</string>
            <string language="en">Chicken family</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Famille de poulet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Família da galinha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Famiglia del pollo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οικογένεια κοτόπουλου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Familia del pollo</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Drei Zeichnungen sollen mit den richtigen Bezeichnungen für weibliche und männliche Tier sowie für Jungtiere bezeichnet werden.</string>
            <string language="en">Label the three drawings with the correct terms for the specific female, male and baby animals.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Tier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Nutztier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Huhn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Animal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Utilizable animal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Chicken</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étiquetez les trois schémas avec les limites 
correctes pour les animaux spécifiques de femelle, de mâle et de 
bébé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Etiquete os três desenhos com os termos corretos
para os animais específicos da fêmea, do macho e do bebê.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Identifichi le tre illustrazioni con i termini 
corretti per gli animali specifici della femmina, del maschio e del 
bambino.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ονομάστε τα τρία σχέδια με τους σωστούς όρους για τα 
συγκεκριμένα ζώα θηλυκών, αρσενικών και μωρών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Etiquete los tres gráficos con los términos 
correctos para los animales específicos de la hembra, del varón y 
del bebé.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Animal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Animal utilisable</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Poulet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Animal</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Animal utilizable</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
